i m terrified of heights.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I enjoy listening to jazz while I fly my model airplanes.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer who works long hours and enjoys watching TV shows to unwind.
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I am not close to my family, but I love my pets.
i watch youtube videos.
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.

content.text: Hi, not much, just working on a software project.
Yes, I am a software engineer. What do you do for a living?
I'm a jewelry designer. I love my job!
That's cool. I've always been interested in jewelry. Do you make your own designs?
Yes, I do. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful.
That's great. I wish I had more talent in that area.
It's all about practice. If you love it, you'll keep doing it and you'll eventually get better.
I guess you're right. I just don't have a lot of free time to practice.
That's fair. I do have a lot of free time, so I can spend it on my hobbies.
It sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
Yes, I do. I love to fly my model airplanes and listen to jazz music.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I'm more of a TV person myself.
That's cool. I love to watch TV too, but I also like to do other things.
I can relate. I just don't have as much free time as you do, I guess.
That's okay. We all have different interests and different amounts of free time.
I'm glad we could chat. It was nice to meet you.
You too. It was nice chatting with you
